summary: This document contains trial preparation notes from December 5, 2021, detailing a witness (referred to as 'U') being prepared for testimony. It records the witness's clarified statements regarding her age when first visiting Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach house, her identification of evidence exhibits, and her recollection of interactions with Ghislaine Maxwell and the FBI.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as 'JE', the owner of the Palm Beach house the witness visited when she was 14.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Identified by the witness as the 'older lady with short black hair and an accent' she described in her 2007 FBI interview. The witness states she was not asked other questions about Maxwell during that interview or her deposition.

connections.description: The witness (U) visited Epstein's Palm Beach house when she was 14 years old, implying a victim-perpetrator dynamic central to the case.
The witness identified Maxwell from a past description and noted a lack of detailed questioning about her in prior interviews.
Maxwell is referenced in the context of the witness's visit to Epstein's house, consistent with her alleged role in facilitating abuse.

events.title: Witness Interview by FBI
events.description: The witness (U) was first interviewed by the FBI. She described an 'older lady with short black hair and an accent' who was Maxwell, but the FBI focused questions on Epstein.

events.title: Trial Testimony Preparation
events.description: Assistant US Attorneys and a Detective prepared the witness (U) for trial testimony, reviewing and clarifying her statements and evidence.

keyFacts: The witness (U) recalls she was 14 years old during the spring/summer when she first went to Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach house.
The witness identified Ghislaine Maxwell as the 'older lady with short black hair and an accent' she described in her 2007 FBI interview.
During her 2007 FBI interview and a subsequent deposition, the witness confirmed she was not asked any other questions about Ghislaine Maxwell; the FBI's focus was on Epstein.

The witness identified several evidence exhibits during preparation, including her birth certificate (GX-11), a photo of herself at age 14 (GX-105), and items related to 'GM' (GX-115) and 'M' (GX-113).
